title: Data Scientist - QuantumBlack, AI by McKinsey
description:
**Who You'll Work With**
 Driving lasting impact and building long-term capabilities with our clients is not easy work. You are the kind of person who thrives in a high performance/high reward culture - doing hard things, picking yourself up when you stumble, and having the resilience to try another way forward.
   

  

 In return for your drive, determination, and curiosity, we'll provide the resources, mentorship, and opportunities you need to become a stronger leader faster than you ever thought possible. Your colleagues—at all levels—will invest deeply in your development, just as much as they invest in delivering exceptional results for clients. Every day, you'll receive apprenticeship, coaching, and exposure that will accelerate your growth in ways you won’t find anywhere else.
   

  

 When you join us, you will have:
   

  

* Continuous learning: Our learning and apprenticeship culture, backed by structured programs, is all about helping you grow while creating an environment where feedback is clear, actionable, and focused on your development. The real magic happens when you take the input from others to heart and embrace the fast-paced learning experience, owning your journey.
* A voice that matters: From day one, we value your ideas and contributions. You’ll make a tangible impact by offering innovative ideas and practical solutions. We not only encourage diverse perspectives, but they are critical in driving us toward the best possible outcomes.
* Global community: With colleagues across 65+ countries and over 100 different nationalities, our firm’s diversity fuels creativity and helps us come up with the best solutions for our clients. Plus, you’ll have the opportunity to learn from exceptional colleagues with diverse backgrounds and experiences.
* World-class benefits: On top of a competitive salary (based on your location, experience, and skills), we provide a comprehensive benefits package to enable holistic well-being for you and your family.


**Your Impact**
 As a Data Scientist, you will collaborate with clients and interdisciplinary teams to develop impactful analytics solutions, optimize code, and solve real-world business problems across diverse industries. You’ll grow as a technologist by contributing to cutting-edge projects, R&D, and global conferences while working alongside world-class talent in a dynamic, innovative environment.
   

  

 In this role, you will partner with clients to understand their needs and develop impactful analytics solutions. You will translate business problems into analytical challenges, build models to solve them, and ensure they are evaluated with relevant metrics. You’ll also contribute to internal tools, participate in R&D projects, and have opportunities to attend and present at conferences like NIPS and ICML.
   

  

 Your work will create real-world impact. By identifying patterns in data and delivering innovative solutions, you will help clients maintain their competitive advantage and transform their day-to-day operations. Your contributions will directly influence business outcomes and drive lasting improvements across industries.
   

  

 You will be in Stockholm, and collaborate closely with data scientists, data engineers, machine learning engineers, designers, and product managers around the world working on interdisciplinary projects that use math, statistics, and machine learning to derive insights from raw data. You will help global companies transform their businesses and enhance performance across industries such as healthcare, automotive, energy, and elite sports.
   

  

 At McKinsey, you’ll thrive in an unparalleled environment for growth. You’ll develop a sought-after perspective by connecting technology and business value, tackle real-life challenges across diverse industries, and collaborate with inspiring multidisciplinary teams, gaining a holistic understanding of AI and its potential to drive transformation.
   

  

**Our Tech Stack**
 While we advocate for using the right tech for the right task, we often leverage the following technologies: Python, PySpark, the PyData stack, SQL, Airflow, Databricks, our own open-source data pipelining framework called Kedro, Dask/RAPIDS, container technologies such as Docker and Kubernetes, cloud solutions such as AWS, GCP, and Azure, and more.
   

  

**Your Qualifications and Skills**
* Bachelors, Masters or PhD level in a discipline such as: computer science, machine learning, applied statistics, mathematics, engineering or artificial intelligence.
* 0-2+ years of professional experience in applying machine learning and data mining techniques to real problems with copious amounts of data
* Programming experience (focus on machine learning): R and/or Python (must), SPSS, SAS, Ruby, Hadoop (valued).
* Ability to prototype statistical analysis and modeling algorithms and apply these algorithms for data driven solutions to problems in new domains
* Ability to independently own and drive model development, balancing demands and deadlines.
* Demonstrated aptitude for analytics.
* While we advocate for using the right tech for the right task, we often leverage the following technologies: Python, PySpark, the PyData stack, SQL, Airflow, Databricks, our own open-source data pipelining framework called Kedro, Dask/RAPIDS, container technologies such as Docker and Kubernetes, cloud solutions such as AWS, GCP, and Azure, and more.
* Strong communication skills, both verbal and written, in English, with the ability to adjust your style to suit different perspectives and seniority levels.
* Exceptional time management to meet your responsibilities in a complex and largely autonomous work environment.
* Good presentation and communication skills, with the ability to explain complex analytical concepts to people from other fields.
* Willingness to travel.

title: Google Workspace Technical Lead
description:
**Company Description**
  

 We're an award-winning Google Cloud partner. We're the experts in transforming businesses and shaping the future of cloud technology. Join us and collaborate with top minds, build groundbreaking solutions, and make a real difference for our clients. Enjoy extensive professional development, global reach, and a supportive, Google-inspired culture. If you're passionate about the cloud, this is where you want to be.
   

  

 With over 13 years of experience in Google Cloud under our belt, offices in 18 countries and more than 600 experts, we have deployed practical innovation alongside Google. We focus on infrastructure modernisation, data management, smart analytics, application modernisation, and AI & machine learning.
   

  

 Curious about our projects? We got you: 
 *Check out our success stories*
  

  

**Job Description**
  

 Are you a visionary and highly skilled Google Workspace expert looking to make a profound impact as a technical leader? Join our Google Workspace Delivery team as a Technical Lead and become the ultimate authority and strategic advisor for our most complex and high-profile customer engagements across the Nordics.
   

  

 In this pivotal role, you will leverage your deep understanding of Google Workspace to drive successful enterprise-level customer outcomes. You will be instrumental in leading the technical execution of Google Workspace transformation engagements, ensuring seamless migrations, and providing expert-level guidance on intricate technical deployments, custom configurations, and strategic integrations. You will mentor less experienced team members and act as a thought leader in the Google Workspace ecosystem.
   

  

**Responsibilities** 
 :
   

* Serve as the trusted technical principal advisor for all Google Workspace matters for our most strategic customers.
* Lead the technical execution of large-scale Google Workspace implementation projects, including complex migrations, advanced integrations, and bespoke custom configurations.
* Provide advanced technical troubleshooting, problem resolution, and root cause analysis for the most challenging issues.
* Proactively analyze complex customer environments to recommend, design, and implement optimal Google Workspace configurations, security postures, and best practices at an enterprise level.
* Collaborate with internal teams, Google product teams, and external stakeholders to ensure successful project delivery, drive innovation, and guarantee unparalleled customer satisfaction.
* Stay at the absolute forefront of the latest Google Workspace features, updates, technical advancements, and emerging trends, acting as an internal subject matter expert.
* Engage with a diverse range of clients across various industries (e.g., scale-ups, retail, technology, gaming, entertainment, public sector) to understand their complex technical needs and strategic challenges.
* Identify, champion, and drive opportunities for technical improvements and strategic evolution within customer Google Workspace environments, influencing long-term technology roadmaps.
* Mentor and provide technical guidance to other Google Workspace specialists and consultants, fostering a culture of continuous learning and excellence.
* Contribute to the development of best practices, methodologies, and technical collateral for Google Workspace deployments.


  

  

**Qualifications**
* Exceptional knowledge and extensive hands-on experience with Google Workspace solutions, confirmed by relevant Google Cloud certifications (e.g., Google Workspace Administrator, Google Cloud Architect, etc).
* Proven experience leading complex technical projects (eg. Microsoft to Google migrations) and managing hybrid environments is a significant advantage.
* Superior communication, presentation, and client-facing consulting skills, capable of influencing executive-level stakeholders and explaining highly complex technical concepts to varied audiences.
* Extensive previous experience with IT network or enterprise systems administration, with a strong understanding of identity management, security, and networking principles relevant to cloud environments.
* Previous roles may have included Solutions Engineer / Architect, Senior Deployment Specialist, Systems Administrator, etc
* Fluent English is required; proficiency in one of the Scandinavian languages is highly preferred.


  

  

**Additional Information**
  

**Why Choose Devoteam G Cloud?**
* Innovative Impact: Work on the forefront  of cloud technology at a globally recognized leader in Google Cloud solutions.
* Direct Google Connection: Collaborate closely with Google teams, shaping the future of cloud and AI.
* Unleash Your Expertise: Thrive in a fast-paced environment where sharing knowledge and success is paramount.
* End-to-End Impact: Drive complete business transformations, from strategy to implementation and beyond.
* Accelerate Your Career: Grow within a Google-inspired culture, gaining specialisations and certifications.


 We do plenty of activities, like meet-ups, hackathons, and partnerships. Don’t lose any of them: 
 *follow us on LinkedIn*
**Benefits**
* Encouragement and support for training and certification, in the form of coaching from other team members, cost coverage, and financial incentives.
* Challenging and rewarding assignments, many of which are end-to-end.
* A hybrid work model as standard, with flexible working hours and location to support your work-life balance.
* An international, diverse, and inclusive team.
* A human-centric and value-based company culture.
* Wellness grants for sports activities (5,000 SEK/year).
* A modern office in central Stockholm.
* Full provision of work tools.
* A variety of social events.


 Our culture is based on continuous learning and career development, supported by a genuine, inclusive, and expert team that really loves pizza.
   

  

 Want to know more about life at Devoteam? 
 *Check our Instagram page*
 Is this not the right position for you? Don’t worry, we have plenty of opportunities! 
 *Check out our Career page*

title: Solution Architect
company_industry: Software Development, IT Services and IT Consulting, and Technology, Information and Internet
description:
**Description**
 What makes us Qlik?
   

  

 A Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ Leader for 15 years in a row, Qlik transforms complex data landscapes into actionable insights, driving strategic business outcomes. Serving over 40,000 global customers, our portfolio leverages pervasive data quality and advanced AI/ML capabilities that lead to better decisions, faster.
   

  

 We excel in integration and governance solutions that work with diverse data sources, and our real-time analytics uncover hidden patterns, empowering teams to address complex challenges and seize new opportunities.
   

  

 The Solution Architect Role
   

  

 Are you a recent graduate with a passion for data, technology, and problem-solving, eager to kick-start your career in a dynamic, customer-facing technical role?
   

  

 In this exciting role, you'll work closely with our experienced Presales and Sales teams, learning to be the technical face of Qlik to our prospective and current customers. You will develop your skills in demonstrating the power of Qlik's platform, helping to solve real-world business challenges, and building essential relationships with key stakeholders. This is a unique opportunity to grow your technical and communication skills within a supportive environment, mentored by industry experts.
   

  

 What makes this role interesting and how you will make an impact:
   

  

* Technical Sales & Demonstrations: Assist in preparing and delivering engaging product presentations, customized demonstrations, and Proof-of-Concepts (POCs) that showcase the business value of Qlik's data integration, analytics, and AI solutions (e.g., Qlik Sense, Qlik Cloud, Qlik Talend, Qlik Automate, Qlik Predict, Qlik Answers).
* Solution Design & Strategy: Develop consultative skills to work with customers, understand their data challenges, and contribute to designing technical solutions using the complete Qlik portfolio.
* Discovery & Requirements Gathering: Attend technical discovery sessions to identify customer needs, current data structures, and technical requirements.
* RFI/RFP Response: Contribute to the technical sections of RFIs (Request for Information) and RFPs (Request for Proposal).
* Public Speaking & Events: Develop and practice your presentation skills to become comfortable speaking to large audiences in English for customer events, webinars, and marketing initiatives.
* Cross-Functional Collaboration: Partner closely with Sales, Professional Services, Product Management, R&D, and Marketing teams, contributing to team success and learning from various departments.
* Technical Expertise & Evangelism: Continuously learn and stay up-to-date with Qlik product developments, industry trends in data analytics, AI/ML, cloud technologies, and competitive offerings.
* Enablement & Content Creation: Assist in developing internal enablement materials and demo environments.
* Relationship Building: Begin to establish and nurture technical relationships with key customer stakeholders.
* Market Insights: Offer valuable field feedback to internal teams to inform future product development.
* Travel: Some travel will be required to meet with customers and attend events.


**We’re Looking For a Teammate With**
* Education: A Bachelor's or Master's degree in a quantitative field such as Data Science, Computer Science, Business Analytics, Engineering, or a related technical field, obtained recently or expected soon.


**Foundational Knowledge & Eagerness To Learn**
* Some academic or project-based experience with Qlik Sense or other BI/analytics tools (e.g., Tableau, Power BI) is a plus.
* Strong interest in or experience with Qlik Cloud Analytics, Qlik Automate, Qlik Predict, and Qlik Answers.
* Knowledge of statistical modeling, data mining, and machine learning principles, including classification and regression models, gained through coursework or personal projects.
* Familiarity with Machine Learning concepts and tools.
* Understanding of automation and workflow orchestration principles, with an interest in designing solutions that drive actions in business applications.
* An eagerness to learn about unstructured data analysis, Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) architectures, and agentic AI architectures.
* Basic understanding of data modeling, ETL/ELT processes, and database concepts (e.g., SQL).
* Familiarity with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP) and SaaS models through coursework or personal exploration.
* Basic knowledge of scripting languages (e.g., Python, R, JavaScript) is a plus.
* Experience with other major cloud platforms and data technologies (e.g., AWS, Google, Microsoft, Snowflake, SAP, Databricks) from academic projects or internships is beneficial.
* Analytical and Problem-Solving Skills: A strong desire and ability to analyze data, recognize patterns, and learn how to turn complex business problems into effective data and AI solutions.
* Communication & Collaboration: Excellent English communication skills (both written and spoken) and a collaborative spirit to work effectively with diverse teams and stakeholders. You should be very comfortable and keen to develop your public speaking skills, with a desire to present to various audiences, including large groups.
* Self-Motivated & Curious: Proactive, organized, with a strong desire to learn and grow in a fast-paced environment.
* Language: Fluent in English (both written and spoken). Fluency in Danish/Swedish is a significant advantage.


 The location for this role is:
   

  

 Stockholm, Sweden
   

  

 Apply now and help change how the world transforms complex data landscapes into actionable insights and turns complex data challenges into new opportunities!
   

  

**More About Qlik And Who We Are**
 Find out more about life at Qlik on social: Instagram, LinkedIn, YouTube, and X/Twitter, and to see all other opportunities to join us and our values, check out our Careers Page.
   

  

 What else do we offer?
   

  

* Genuine career progression pathways and mentoring programs
* Culture of innovation, technology, collaboration, and openness
* Flexible, diverse, and international work environment


 Giving back is a huge part of our culture. Alongside an extra “change the world” day plus another for personal development, we also highly encourage participation in our Corporate Responsibility Employee Programs
   

  

 If you need assistance applying for a role due to a disability, please submit your request via email to accessibilityta @ qlik.com. Any information you provide will be treated according to Qlik’s Recruitment Privacy Notice. Qlik may only respond to emails related to accommodation requests.
   

  

 Qlik is not accepting unsolicited assistance from search firms for this employment opportunity. Please, no phone calls or emails. All resumes submitted by search firms to any employee at Qlik via-email, the Internet or in any form and/or method without a valid written search agreement in place for this position will be deemed the sole property of Qlik. No fee will be paid in the event the candidate is hired by Qlik as a result of the referral or through other means.

title: Service Delivery Manager
description:
*Vill du vara med och driva digitalisering och utveckling inom IT tillsammans med engagerade kollegor? Hos oss får du en central roll där du leder leveransteam och säkerställer att verksamhetens behov möts med rätt lösningar. Vi erbjuder dig möjligheten att arbeta i en organisation som befinner sig på en spännande digitaliseringsresa, där du får stort ansvar och möjlighet att påverka.*
**Om jobbet**
 Som Service Delivery Manager får du en nyckelroll i gränssnittet mellan våra affärsenheter och Digital & IT. Du leder ett leveransteam och har ett helhetsansvar för att våra tjänster och produkter levereras i linje med verksamhetens behov. Du är en viktig länk mellan interna team, leverantörer och affärsenheter och arbetar för att säkerställa att både kortsiktiga och långsiktiga behov fångas upp och hanteras på bästa sätt.
   

  

 Dina arbetsuppgifter kommer vara bland annat:
   

  

* Representera Digital & IT:s leverans mot affärsenheten
* Utveckla och upprätthålla relationen med affärsenheten
* Hantera och koordinera leveransfrågor, förfrågningar samt driva och följa upp förbättringsaktiviteter
* Planera, prioritera och resursfördela inom leveransområdet
* Informera affärsenheten om DigIT:s tjänster, processer och serviceplaner
* Presentera leveransstatus, SLA- och KPI-rapporter till affärsområdet


**Vem är du?**
 Följande kommer göra dig framgångsrik i denna tjänst:
   

  

* Tidigare erfarenhet av ledande roller som Service Delivery Manager, chef eller senior projektledare inom IT
* Erfarenhet av att leda tvärfunktionella team i komplexa leveranser eller högriskprojekt
* Erfarenhet av att identifiera problem och initiera lösningar
* Kunskap inom ITSM och agila metoder och principer
* Akademisk bakgrund och relevant arbetslivserfarenhet inom IT
* Erfarenhet av kundrelationer
* Goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska, både i tal och skrift


 Meriterande är även om du har:
   

  

* Gedigen erfarenhet av IT-infrastruktur och tjänster


 Som person är du driven, strukturerad och engagerad. Du har lätt för att skapa struktur för dig själv och tydlighet för andra, och du trivs med att arbeta självständigt såväl som i team. Du är uthållig, lösningsorienterad och har en positiv inställning till att utveckla både organisation och verksamhet.
   

  

 Din samarbetsförmåga är god och du har lätt för att förankra och driva igenom aktiviteter tillsammans med andra. Därtill har du ett analytiskt och strategiskt tankesätt, med en förmåga att prioritera, exekvera, följa upp, rapportera, och eskalera vid behov.
   

  

**Om oss**
 Digital & IT befinner sig mitt i en spännande digitaliseringsresa där vi utvecklar och förvaltar IT-infrastruktur, drift- och kommunikationstjänster utifrån affärsverksamhetens behov. Vi arbetar nära våra fyra affärsenheter – Bank, SAK, LIV och Agria – samt övriga delar av Digital & IT.
   

  

 Vår avdelning DSOP består av cirka 80 anställda och vi samarbetar även med outsourcade partners, där vårt största partnerskap omfattar cirka 150 personer. Inom Service Delivery är vi cirka 12 personer, organiserade i fyra dedikerade leveransteam.
   

  

**Mer information**
*Låter det spännande? Då vill vi veta mer om dig! Välkommen med din ansökan redan idag. Vi arbetar löpande med denna rekrytering och kan komma att tillsätta tjänsten innan sista ansökningsdag.*
**Sista ansökningsdag: 2025-09-16**

title: Cloud IAM Engineer till Handelsbanken
description:
Vi söker en Cloud IAM Engineer som vill ta ansvar för att utveckla och förvalta bankens lösningar inom identitets- och åtkomsthantering i molnet, med fokus på säkerhet, automation och användarvänlighet.
   

  

**Ditt team**
 Som Cloud IAM Engineer kommer du att ingå i teamet Cloud Foundation, ett tvärfunktionellt team hos oss. Inom området arbetar säkerhetsingenjörer, molnarkitekter, utvecklare tillsammans med stödjande funktioner inom compliance, säkerhet och support med att designa, implementera och vidareutveckla bankens molnlösningar enligt gällande säkerhets- och regulatoriska krav.
   

  

 Området består av 28 medarbetare och ett tiotal konsulter fördelat på två agila team, ett virtuellt Cloud Center of Excellence team och en stödfunktion. I det tvärfunktionella teamet Cloud Foundation där Cloud IAM Engineer rollen kommer att ingå har vi 12 medarbetare och ett par konsulter.
   

  

 Rollen innebär nära samarbeten med andra områden i banken såsom säkerhetsfunktioner, infrastrukturteam och bankens operations centers.
   

  

**Din roll**
 Som Cloud IAM Engineer ansvarar du för design, implementation och förvaltning av Microsoft Entra ID-lösningar och Azure RBAC. Du arbetar med identitets- och åtkomsthantering, säkerhetsprinciper, SSO, MFA och integrationer med både interna och externa system.
   

  

 ,
   

  

**Din profil**
 Vi ser att du har djup teknisk kompetens inom identitets- och åtkomsthantering i molnmiljö, särskilt med Microsoft Entra ID och relaterade komponenter som Conditional Access, Identity Protection och Privileged Identity Management (PIM). Du har även erfarenhet av att arbeta med Azure RBAC och att integrera identitetstjänster mot både SaaS-lösningar och lokala system.
   

  

 Automatisering är en stor del av ditt arbete, och du är van att använda både PowerShell och Microsoft Graph API. Du har god kännedom om standarder och protokoll som SSO, MFA, SCIM, OAuth2, SAML och OpenID Connect samt erfarenhet av hybrididentitet via Azure AD Connect. Vi tror även att du förstår principerna bakom Zero Trust och kan tillämpa säkerhetsprinciper i en komplex infrastruktur. Vi ser det även som meriterande om du har följande certifieringar:
   

  

* Microsoft Certified: Identity and Access Administrator Associate (SC-300)
* Microsoft Certified: Azure Solutions Architect Expert


 Som person är du analytisk och lösningsorienterad, med ett starkt säkerhetsfokus. Du är kommunikativ och pedagogisk, trivs i team men arbetar lika gärna självständigt, och är van vid att jobba i en agil miljö.
   

  

 Du har eftergymnasial utbildning inom IT eller motsvarande erfarenhet.
   

  

**Välkommen med din ansökan!**
**Kontaktuppgifter**
**Rekryterande chef:** 
 Nabila Yalcin, nabila.yalcin@handelsbanken.se
   

  

**TA Partner:** 
 Oscar Stierncreutz, oscar.stierncreutz@handelsbanken.se
   

  

**Facklig representant Finansförbundet:** 
 Per Almshult, per.almshult@handelsbanken.se
   

  

**Facklig representant Akademikerföreningen:** 
 Bjarne Nilsson, bjarne.nilsson@handelsbanken.se

title: IT Security Architect (m/f/d) - Business Applications
description:
Octapharma specializes in the development of highly pure pharmaceuticals made of human blood plasma. As part of a family-owned enterprise, Octapharma in Vienna is not only the largest production site, but also a successful research location of the Octapharma Group.
 **This position is available in either Vienna (Austria), Stockholm (Sweden) or Lachen (Switzerland). Candidates may indicate their preferred location.** 
 Since our company continues to grow, we are now hiring for our team.
   

  

**Your New Challenges Which Will Inspire You**
* Continuously assess and manage the security and risk posture across our enterprise application portfolio
* Guide IT business partner teams in designing and delivering secure business application solutions
* Define and standardize authorization concepts in support of our IAM initiatives, ensuring consistency across platforms such as SAP, Veeva, and Kinaxis
* Lead the development of integration security standards for APIs, data exchanges, and authentication mechanisms
* Classify business applications and align security controls based on criticality, organizational value streams, and process sensitivity
* Collaborate closely with security, enterprise architecture, infrastructure, and application teams to implement comprehensive cloud and SaaS security models


**Your Profile That Will Convince Us**
* Bachelor’s or master’s degree in computer science, Information Security, or related discipline
* 5+ years of experience in IT Security for enterprise application like SAP, including 2+ years in security architecture
* Knowledge of enterprise/security architecture frameworks (e.g. TOGAF, SABSA) and business capability modeling
* Hands-on with IAM systems and the development of authorization models and role concepts
* Solid understanding of cloud security architectures (AWS, Azure, private/hybrid cloud)
* Strong collaboration, communication and documentation skills in English (German is a plus)
* Proactive, structured and responsible approach to work


**Our Attractive Benefits For You**
* Wide range of tasks in an international setting, flexibility and personal responsibility
* Reliable employer with generous employee benefits and a salary customary in the market.
* Familiar setting of a family-owned enterprise with benefits such as Do & Co staff restaurant, extraordinary staff events and many more:


**Additional Information**
 The minimum gross wage according to the collective agreement (chemical industry) for your new job is EUR 4.270,14. We strive to adapt your salary to your range of tasks and to your profile, which is why we are ready to pay wages higher than collectively agreed. This is a legal requirement in Austria which is not applicable for Switzerland/Sweden.
   

  

 We are looking forward to new, committed employees who join forces with us to promote our strong growth in order to keep enabling our patients to live a better life - because it is in our blood! Is it in your blood too? We are looking forward to receiving your application via our online career portal.
   

  

**Your Contact**
 Johanna Proksch
   

  

 Octapharma Pharmazeutika Produktionsges.m.b.H.
   

  

 Oberlaaer Straße 235, 1100 Wien
   

  

 T: +43 (1) 610 32 - 4299

title: Framtida Möjlighet: Konsultchef – Teknik & Ledarskap | ALTEN Stockholm
company_industry: IT Services and IT Consulting, Business Consulting and Services, and Engineering Services
description:
**Vill du kombinera teknik, affärer och ledarskap i en roll med stort ansvar och utvecklingsmöjligheter? Hos ALTEN Stockholm får du driva affärer, bygga relationer och leda medarbetare i en dynamisk miljö.** 




  





 Vi söker engagerade personer som vill utvecklas inom både teknik och affärsutveckling. Som konsultchef ansvarar du för ett eget affärsområde – du utvecklar kundrelationer, rekryterar nya konsulter och coachar ditt team till framgång.
 



  





**Om rollen** 




 Som konsultchef kommer du att:
 


* **Bygga och utveckla kundrelationer** 
 genom affärsutveckling och säljaktiviteter
* **Rekrytera och utveckla konsulter** 
 inom teknik och IT
* **Leda och stötta ditt team** 
 genom coachande ledarskap
* **Bidra till verksamhetens tillväxt och resultat** 
 tillsammans med andra chefer



  





**Vi söker dig som:** 



* Har erfarenhet inom teknik, industri, IT eller liknande område
* Har erfarenhet av B2B-sälj, affärsutveckling eller konsultverksamhet – eller en stark vilja att utvecklas inom området
* Har god kommunikativ förmåga på svenska och engelska
* Har eftergymnasial utbildning inom teknik, IT, ekonomi eller motsvarande erfarenhet
* Har B-körkort



  





**Extra meriterande:** 



* Erfarenhet av personalansvar, ledarskap eller rekrytering
* Tidigare arbete inom konsultbranschen eller projektledning



  





**Vi erbjuder:** 



* Möjligheten att kombinera teknik och affärer i en internationell organisation
* Bonussystem som belönar prestation
* Individanpassad kompetensutveckling och tydliga karriärvägar
* En stark företagskultur med samarbete och entreprenörsanda i fokus



  





**Redo att ta nästa steg?** 




 Skicka in din ansökan redan idag – vi ser fram emot att höra från dig!

title: Customer Technology Advisor - Application Services (Nordics)
job_function: Sales, Business Development, and Customer Service
description:
**Who We Are**
 At Kyndryl, we design, build, manage and modernize the mission-critical technology systems that the world depends on every day. So why work at Kyndryl? We are always moving forward – always pushing ourselves to go further in our efforts to build a more equitable, inclusive world for our employees, our customers and our communities.
   

  

**The Role**
 Join our dynamic team as a Customer Technology Advisor and become an integral part of our cutting-edge Go-To-Market team. As a certified expert in your field, you will be at the forefront of revolutionizing technology solutions for our valued customers. Working hand in hand with our Kyndryl Consult Partners and customer partners, you will leverage your technical and solution expertise to drive targeted opportunities and exceed customer expectations.
   

  

 In this role, you won't just be another advisor; you will be a trusted ally and visionary, delivering unique and differentiated value to our customers. Through captivating show-and-tell methods such as engaging demos and compelling presentations, you will showcase our credibility and eminence in the industry, leaving a lasting impression on potential customers.
   

  

 As a vital member of our team, you will support Consulting, Advisory, and Architecture activities across Sales, Pre-Sales & Delivery, collaborating closely with Customer Partners and Kyndryl Consult Partners. With your extensive technical knowledge and mastery of the practice-specific domain, you will bring together the breadth of Kyndryl's expertise to develop profitable deals that drive our success.
   

  

 Your dedication to continuous improvement and your passion for our practice will shine through as you showcase your end-to-end knowledge of the domain you align with, as well as the associated subdomains. Your technical prowess, backed by your external certifications, will establish you as a true authority in your field.
   

  

 As a Customer Technology Advisor, you will possess strong technical and business acumen, allowing you to provide value driven solutions within the practice services domain(s). Your exceptional customer facing skills, combined with your articulate communication style and interpersonal finesse, will enable you to effortlessly convey the technical benefits of Kyndryl's capabilities, perfectly matching the unique needs of each customer.
   

  

 As a strategic thinker, you will identify the intricate business and technical requirements of our customers, leveraging the vast capabilities of Kyndryl to generate winning cross-practice solutions. Your ability to develop and deliver compelling demonstrations, proof of concepts, and prototypes will clearly demonstrate the tangible value our offerings bring to our customers, leaving them eager to partner with us.
   

  

 In addition to your technical expertise, you will also take the lead in coordinating the entire pre-sales process, ensuring quality and compliance verification while adhering to Kyndryl best practices. Your collaboration with internal and external stakeholders will generate winning responses and create optimal technical solutions. Moreover, you will actively build and nurture relationships with our external alliance partners, fostering a collaborative environment where joint solutions are co-created.
   

  

 Join our team of forward thinking, tech-savvy professionals and embark on a journey of innovation, growth, and fulfillment. As a Customer Technology Advisor, you will not only shape the future of technology solutions but also make a meaningful impact on the success of our customers and Kyndryl as a whole.
   

  

 Your Future at Kyndryl
   

  

 Every position at Kyndryl offers a way forward to grow your career. We have opportunities that you won’t find anywhere else, including hands-on experience, learning opportunities, and the chance to certify in all four major platforms. Whether you want to broaden your knowledge base or narrow your scope and specialize in a specific sector, you can find your opportunity here.
   

  

**Who You Are**
 You’re good at what you do and possess the required experience to prove it. However, equally as important – you have a growth mindset; keen to drive your own personal and professional development. You are customer-focused – someone who prioritizes customer success in their work. And finally, you’re open and borderless – naturally inclusive in how you work with others.
   

  

**Required Skills And Experience**
* Deep domain knowledge of Services offerings and technical solutions in a practice
* Demonstrated experience translating distinctive technical knowledge into actionable customer insights and solutions
* Prior consultative selling experience
* Externally recognized as an expert in the technology and/or solutioning areas, including technical certifications supporting subdomain focus area(s) including: Application Data and AI; Cloud; Core Enterprise and zCloud; Digital Workplace; Network and Edge; Security and Resiliency


**Preferred Skills And Experience**
* Bachelor's degree or Master’s degree
* 5 years of experience (minimum) selling technical services for multi-industry customers


**Being You**
 Diversity is a whole lot more than what we look like or where we come from, it’s how we think and who we are. We welcome people of all cultures, backgrounds, and experiences. But we’re not doing it single-handily: Our Kyndryl Inclusion Networks are only one of many ways we create a workplace where all Kyndryls can find and provide support and advice. This dedication to welcoming everyone into our company means that Kyndryl gives you – and everyone next to you – the ability to bring your whole self to work, individually and collectively, and support the activation of our equitable culture. That’s the Kyndryl Way.
   

  

**What You Can Expect**
 With state-of-the-art resources and Fortune 100 clients, every day is an opportunity to innovate, build new capabilities, new relationships, new processes, and new value. Kyndryl cares about your well-being and prides itself on offering benefits that give you choice, reflect the diversity of our employees and support you and your family through the moments that matter – wherever you are in your life journey. Our employee learning programs give you access to the best learning in the industry to receive certifications, including Microsoft, Google, Amazon, Skillsoft, and many more. Through our company-wide volunteering and giving platform, you can donate, start fundraisers, volunteer, and search over 2 million non-profit organizations. At Kyndryl, we invest heavily in you, we want you to succeed so that together, we will all succeed.
   

  

**Get Referred!**
 If you know someone that works at Kyndryl, when asked ‘How Did You Hear About Us’ during the application process, select ‘Employee Referral’ and enter your contact's Kyndryl email address.

title: 🌟 Sales Development Representative (SDR) – Fokus på svenska & norska marknaden
description:
📍 Stockholm (HQ) | 🕒 Heltid | 🌍 Global Sales Development
   

  

**🚀 Var med och skapa en framtid utan talent waste**
 På Assessio har vi ett djärvt mål: att eliminera talent waste. Vi vill hjälpa människor att lyckas i roller där de verkligen kan blomstra och prestera på topp. Med vår AI-drivna plattform för people data ger vi företag och organisationer forskningsbaserade verktyg för rekrytering och utveckling – smartare, rättvisare och mer skalbart.
   

  

 Vi är redan 200+ kollegor i 8 länder och växer snabbt. Nu söker vi en
 **Sales Development Representative (SDR)** 
 till vårt team i Stockholm, med ansvar för den svenska och norska marknaden.
   

  

**💡 Rollen**
 Som SDR är du den första kontakten med våra framtida kunder. Du är den som väcker intresse, kvalificerar leads och bokar möten som leder till affärer för våra Account Executives.
   

  

 Du samarbetar nära både marknadsteamet och vårt nordiska säljteam för att bygga en stark pipeline och skapa långsiktiga relationer.
   

  

****🔑 Dina ansvarsområden****
* Skapa och kvalificera både inkommande och utgående leads
* Boka möten och demos för Account Executives i Sverige och Norge
* Researcha och identifiera prospekt som matchar vår ICP
* Ta kontakt via e-post, telefon och sociala medier
* Hålla CRM uppdaterat och följa upp dina aktiviteter
* Samarbeta med marknadsteamet för att få ut max av kampanjer
* Lära dig våra SaaS-lösningar och förstå kundernas utmaningar


**👋 Vem är du?**
 Vi tror på potential – det viktiga är din nyfikenhet och driv. Du kan vara tidigt i din karriär, men vi ser gärna att du är:
   

  

* Bekväm med att ta kontakt via telefon och digitala kanaler
* Nyfiken, strukturerad och taggad på att växa inom tech-försäljning
* Bosatt i Stockholm och talar flytande svenska & engelska (norska = pluspoäng)
* En stark kommunikatör och teamplayer
* Målmedveten och resultatorienterad


**🎓 Din bakgrund**
 Vi söker dig som framför allt har rätt inställning och driv – erfarenhet är inte ett krav!
   

  

 Det är meriterande om du har:
   

  

* Erfarenhet av försäljning, gärna B2B eller SaaS
* Erfarenhet av CRM-verktyg (t.ex. HubSpot)
* Erfarenhet av kall outreach, t.ex. via telefon, e-post eller LinkedIn


 Men viktigast är att du:
   

  

* Har ett genuint intresse för försäljning och att skapa värde för kunder
* Är nyfiken, orädd och vill lära dig nytt varje dag
* Har energi, engagemang och gillar att arbeta mot tydliga mål
* Trivs med att arbeta i team och samtidigt kan ta eget ansvar
* Vill vara en del av en snabbväxande SaaS-miljö där vi firar framgångar tillsammans


**🌟 Varför Assessio?**
* En syftesdriven kultur med en tydlig vision
* Moderna verktyg och flexibelt arbetssätt
* Härligt kontor i centrala Stockholm + hybridupplägg (tre dagar på kontor, två dagar hemma)
* Fastlön + bonus
* Möjlighet att påverka och göra skillnad på den nordiska marknaden
* Tydliga utvecklingsmöjligheter och en resa i ett snabbt växande SaaS-bolag


 Vi lever som vi lär – därför går alla kandidater igenom tre korta tester (personlighet, problemlösning och motivation) för att säkerställa en rättvis och potentialbaserad process.
   

  

 👉 Redo att bli en del av vår resa?
 **Ansök nu – vi ser fram emot att lära känna dig!**

title: Strategy Director - Business & Operations Support Systems
description:
**Join our Team**
**About this opportunity:**
 Ericsson Cloud Software & Services (BCSS) provides industry-leading solutions for Core Network and Automation, Managed Services, Services Orchestration, and Telecom BSS. We enable communication service providers to transition to cloud-native software and automated operations, preparing their networks for the future. We’re a global team of 31,000 operating in many countries supporting our global customers across 180 geographies.
   

  

 Within BCSS, we are now hiring a
 **Strategy director** 
 for the Solution Area - Business & Operations Support Systems (SA BOS). We develop and deliver competitive global BSS & OSS IT Near solutions, both products and services. SA BOS’s portfolio includes BSS offerings such as Online Charging Systems, Billing, Catalog and Order Management as well as OSS solutions like Adaptive Inventory, Expert Analytics, and Service & Network Slicing Orchestration. Additionally, SA BOS manages all Managed Services (MSIT) and Customer Application Development & Maintenance (ADM) linked to these Ericsson products, along with third-party partnerships in the BSS and OSS domains.
   

  

 We are seeking a
 **SA BOS Strategy Director** 
 to help shape the future of SA BOS. In this pivotal role, you will work across the entire organization, driving initiatives from identifying key issues and developing hypotheses to conducting analyses, and turning them into actionable strategies. Directly reporting to the Head of Strategy & Business Operations, you will play a critical role in guiding our strategic direction and delivering measurable impact.
   

  

**What you will do:**
 Your responsiblities will include:
   

  

* Develop and execute a comprehensive SA BOS strategy that defines the organization's long-term vision, goals, and strategic priorities
* Conduct market analysis, competitive intelligence, and trend forecasting to identify new opportunities and potential threats.
* Develop and implement strategies that leverage technology to optimize operations and enhance decision-making capabilities across the organization (AI, cloud, etc.)
* Drive the strategic planning, execution, and oversight of key transformation initiatives across SA BOS and beyond
* Lead and facilitating the strategic planning process, translating high-level vision into actionable initiatives and roadmaps.
* Drive organizational alignment around strategic objectives, ensuring all departments contribute to the overarching vision.
* Develop and tracking KPIs and OKRs to measure progress and adapt plans as needed


**The skills you bring:**
 To be successful in this role we expect you to have:
   

  

* 8–10+ years experience in strategy, consulting, or transformative business roles. Background from top-tier management consulting or internal strategy units preferred.
* Proven ability to develop and execute complex strategies that drive organizational success
* Knowledge of digital business transformation, automation, and key trends related to AI and Cloud in the telecom sector
* Strong understanding of the CSP business and telecom industry landscape.
* Strong strategic thinking, business acumen, and ability to drive profitable growth while ensuring operational excellence
* Excellent communication with the ability to influence executives
* Experience in leading change initiatives and managing stakeholder engagement to ensure successful strategy implementation
* Strong leadership skills with experience in managing cross-functional teams and fostering collaborative relationships.
* Experienced in coaching and fostering inclusive cultures
* Unwavering ethics, compliance, and professional integrity


**Why join Ericsson?**
 At Ericsson, you´ll have an outstanding opportunity. The chance to use your skills and imagination to push the boundaries of what´s possible. To build solutions never seen before to some of the world’s toughest problems. You´ll be challenged, but you won’t be alone. You´ll be joining a team of diverse innovators, all driven to go beyond the status quo to craft what comes next.
   

  

**What happens once you apply?**
 Click Here to find all you need to know about what our typical hiring process looks like.
   

  

 Encouraging a diverse and inclusive organization is core to our values at Ericsson, that's why we champion it in everything we do. We truly believe that by collaborating with people with different experiences we drive innovation, which is essential for our future growth. We encourage people from all backgrounds to apply and realize their full potential as part of our Ericsson team. Ericsson is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. learn more.
   

  

**Primary country and city:** 
 Sweden (SE) || Stockholm
   

  

**Req ID:** 
 769851

* experience in SAP Basis administration and architecture.

title: Staff Engineer – AI Team
description:
Odevo is a group of exciting brands with a shared vision of challenging status quo in the property management industry. We are committed to revolutionizing the industry with innovative software solutions that make managing properties easier, more efficient, and more effective. Our rapidly growing product and engineering organization now includes around 200 highly skilled professionals.
   

  

 Our cloud-based platform is unique, and in a brief time, we have proven ourselves as a leading and innovative player on the market. Our product development department acts as a SaaS supplier to all the companies in the Odevo group and several other players in the industry. Together, we will continue to challenge and change this industry. To continue our ambitious growth journey, we seek more great people to join us to build market-leading property management software products. Are you one of them?
   

  

 As a Staff Engineer in the AI Team, you will be part of a team that is responsible for our organization's AI-focused initiatives, unlocking the full potential of artificial intelligence to create transformative solutions for our business opportunities. With your experience in building and maintaining a microservice architecture built with Python you will guide the other engineers in the AI team to deliver AI solutions to business problems, mainly through usage of LLMs from various providers. We want to deeply integrate AI across our organization, drive innovation and ensure that AI is a clear part of our business strategy.
   

  

 You will be reporting to our AI Engineering Manager.
   

  

**Who You Are**
 You are an experienced and driven software engineer who has been part of the Generative AI wave, and both experimented with and shipped applications to real users. Complex challenges do not deter you; they intrigue you. You tackle them methodically, finding practical solutions that truly make a difference. You are an excellent communicator who really enjoys to share knowledge through actions and mentorship of less senior engineers. You prefer working in a team with developers, designers and product managers and deeply collaborate with your team rather than working from specifications. You communicate effectively and can discuss the pros and cons of different options in constructive ways.
   

  

 As the AI field is moving forward at enormous speed, you are constantly following tech news for interesting developments that you can use to solve business problems.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams, including engineers, and product managers, to define requirements, deliver and maintain AI solutions that meet business needs.
* Mentor and guide other engineers in the AI Team and other teams at Odevo, sharing your expertise in building AI applications and microservice architectures.
* Stay up to date with the latest developments in generative AI, actively following open-source projects and explore innovative AI technologies that can benefit the organization.
* Document architecture designs, algorithms, and best practices for knowledge sharing within the organization.
* Assist and inspire AI development done by other teams in the organization.


**Qualifications**
* Bachelor's or Master's degree in computer science, Machine Learning, or a related field.
* 10+ years of experience in software development using Python. Experience with React for frontend development and other languages is also valued as we’re always open to using the best tool for the task at hand.
* Proven experience with building applications for real users, spanning design, frontend, backend, databases and infrastructure. We don’t require deep experience in all areas.
* Proficiency in Swedish


*You will be asked to demo your experience in the interview process*
**Location**
 We highly value the opportunity to collaborate closely with our Stockholm-based team in person. At the same time, we recognize the importance of having uninterrupted time for deep focus. Therefore, our team follows a hybrid setup, typically spending 3 days at the Stockholm office and 2 days working remotely from home, allowing for a flexible approach that combines the best of both worlds. However, team members are welcome to come into the office more frequently if they prefer!
   

  

**What We Offer**
* Professional growth - to work with the most talented developers in the industry.
* Modern technology - we invest in the latest technologies and tools and encourage our team members to share their ideas and take ownership of their work.
* Innovation - to work on exciting projects that push the boundaries of our industry and make a real impact.
* Commitment to quality - a dynamic and forward-thinking company that values profitable and long-term product development.


**Excited?**
 If you are excited about being part of a successful team, apply for this position!
   

  

 👉🏽 Why we formed Odevo
   

  

 🔍 About Odevo
   

  

 🌐 Our Software
   

  

 #msl

title: Senior Data Analyst/IT Analyst with Snowflake
description:
**Job ID: 30396**
 Welcome to Group Technology, where we pride ourselves on engineering solutions and direct Nordea’s transformation by providing a holistic technological view and structured understanding of the bank, and its surrounding environment to enable the Customer Vision and the Business Strategy.
   

  

 We are looking for a Data Analyst/IT Analyst with Snowflake to join our Team in Poland (Warsaw/Gdańsk/Łódź) or Sweden (Stockholm).
   

  

 Nordea is a place where traditions meet tomorrow. We're not just a bank, we're a tech employer on a mission to evolve finance securely and responsibly. Together, we impact millions of people’s daily lives by ensuring they can access our solutions anytime, anywhere, while safeguarding their personal data and wealth. Join us in making an impact on the banking industry.
   

  

**About Our Team**
 Meet the Common Data Warehouse Requirements and Analysis team. We are responsible for building the bank’s Common Data Warehousing solution using state of the art cloud solutions. We add value by providing expert analysts and data modelling capabilities and expertise in the data warehousing and data integration areas for many solutions in the bank based on cloud-based technologies like Snowflake, and many other modern technologies.
   

  

 Our team specializes in data analysis, data modelling, and data architecture. As the IT Analyst, you will play a crucial role in project development lifecycle. Our technology stack includes, but is not limited to: Snowflake, DataStage, ETL Architecture, Cloud-based databases, Data Mesh, Data Vault.
   

  

 We are looking for the IT Analyst to perform data analysis and data model transformation tasks. You will be working as an interface between business and IT to help translate the business requirements into IT mappings, as well as help understand data patterns and design innovative solutions.
   

  

**What you will be doing:**
* Perform complex data analysis to help IT clarify requirements towards business and test use cases.
* Map source data to target data models in the most optimal way (financial services logical data model).
* Act as technical SME and help IT development teams in understanding the requirements


**Who You Are**
 This is the right role for you if you have a passion for data analysis and problem solving. You are exceptionally good in interpersonal communications and proficient in English language.
   

  

**Your background and skills include:**
* A degree in Computer Science or related field.
* At least 5 years’ experience in IT.
* Have worked with requirement management.
* Experience of working in multinational virtual teams.
* Understanding of Data Warehousing industry standards.
* Understanding of ETL/BI/Data Analytics/Data Modelling processes.
* Experience in writing SQL.
* Proficiency in local language is preferred, as it supports collaboration with local teams and stakeholders.
* Fluency in English is required to freely communicate with stakeholders.


**It would be ideal if you also have:**
* Experience with Snowflake.
* Knowledge of Data Mesh, Data Virtualization, Data Vault.
* Experience working in SAFe environment.


 If this sounds like you, get in touch!
   

  

**Next steps**
 Submit your application no later than 31/08/2025.
   

  

**We enable dreams and aspirations for a greater good.**
**We build relationships.** 
 We add a personal touch to everything we do – when advising our customers, collaborating with colleagues, and meeting our potential candidates.
   

  

**We learn and develop.** 
 We take pride in being experts and thinking ahead. We use our expertise to meet our customers’ needs, from the simplest to the most complex. We bring a growth mindset to our work that enables us to focus on a broader perspective in our daily challenges.
   

  

**We lead change.** 
 We are responsible and aware of the impact of our decisions, both for our customers and for our local and global communities. Mindful of our responsibility towards current and future generations, we have made sustainability an integrated part of our business strategy.
   

  

**We are Nordea.** 
 We have a 200-year history of supporting and growing the Nordic economies and our values are deeply rooted in these open, progressive and collaborative societies. As one of the biggest employers in the Nordics, Poland and Estonia, you have excellent opportunities to evolve, develop and move forward with us.
   

  

 Studies show that members of underrepresented communities don’t apply for jobs unless they tick all the qualification boxes. If this is part of why you hesitate to apply, we would like you to reconsider and give it a chance. Maybe your profile fits our needs much better than you think.
   

  

**Only for candidates in Sweden:** 
 For union information, please contact Finansförbundet at finansforbundet@nordea.se or SACO at SacoNordea@nordea.com.
   

  

**Only for candidates in Poland:** 
 Please include permit for processing personal data in CV as following:
   

  

 In accordance with art. 6 (1) a and b. Regulation (EU) 2016/679 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 27 April 2016 on the protection of natural persons with regard to the processing of personal data and on the free movement of such data, and repealing Directive 95/46/EC (General Data Protection Regulation) hereinafter ‘GDPR’. I agree to have: my personal data, education and employment history proceeded for the purposes of current and future recruitment processes in Nordea Bank Abp.
   

  

 The administrator of your personal data is: Nordea Bank Abp operating in Poland through its Branch, address: Aleja Edwarda Rydza Śmiglego 20, 93-281 Łodź. Your personal data will be processed for the recruitment processes in Nordea Bank Abp. You have a right to access your personal data, right to rectify and right to delete. Disclosing the personal data in the scope specified by the provisions of Polish Labour Code from 26 June 1974 and executive acts are mandatory. Providing personal data is necessary to conduct the recruitment processes. The request for the deletion of your personal data means resignation from further participation in recruitment processes and causes the immediate removal of your application. Detailed information concerning processing of your personal data can be found at: https://www.nordea.com/en/doc/nordea-privacy-policy-for-applicants.pdf
   

  

 We reserve the right to reply only to selected applications.

title: Client Executive - Sysarb
description:
**At Sysarb, we’ve been pioneering the field of pay equity for nearly two decades. Through our powerful combination of data, technology, and expertise, we enable companies around the world to create fair, transparent, and equitable workplaces. With 700 clients across more than 80 countries, our solutions are shaping the future of compensation – and we’re just getting started. 💥** 




  





**🌟 What this role is about:** 




 As a Client Executive, you will play a key role in Sysarb’s growth across the European Union market. Your primary mission will be to identify, engage, and convert new business opportunities – especially those driven by the growing demand for compliance and strategy related to the EU Pay Transparency Directive.
 



  





 You'll handle the full sales cycle – from prospecting and running demos, to building a strong pipeline and driving deals to closure. You'll also contribute to market analysis, partner-driven sales, and tracking pay equity developments within EU legislation. Your insights will directly influence how we scale in a rapidly evolving regulatory landscape.
 



  





 This position is based in Stockholm and reports to our Head of Sales.
 



**🧭 We’re looking for someone who:** 



* Has 1–2 years of experience in SaaS/B2B sales or business development
* Holds a Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or a related field (or has relevant experience in place of a degree)
* Has a proven track record of creating and closing new business opportunities
* Speaks Swedish and English fluently
* Brings a growth mindset and thrives in a fast-paced, evolving environment



  





**🎁 What we offer:** 



* Competitive Compensation – Base salary of 30,000 SEK/month with commission potential up to 40,000 SEK/month
* Flexible Vacation Policy – Recharge when you need to
* A dynamic, inclusive, and collaborative work culture
* The opportunity to work with a cutting-edge product that’s having real, positive impact across global workplaces

title: Kvantitativ studentanalytiker
description:
Ansök nu
   

  

 Är du en driven student som vill kombinera programmering med finans och försäkring? Söderberg & Partners letar nu efter kompetenta och engagerade studenter för arbete som kvantitativ studentanalytiker med placering i centrala Stockholm.
   

  

 Arbetet innebär först och främst att bistå organisationen med affärsstöd och affärsutveckling, där du bygger, vidareutvecklar och underhåller kvantitativa modeller samt levererar analyser och rapporter till både interna och externa mottagare. Arbetsuppgifterna innebär att hantera stora datamängder, utveckla samt automatisera processer med verktyg som Python, SQL och Excel, därför behöver du ha goda kunskaper i dessa program. Efterhand och för rätt person kan ansvaret utvidgas till att omfatta projektledning och affärsutveckling av större projekt, där såväl logiskt som kreativt tänkande kommer väl till pass.
   

  

 Vi vill att du arbetar regelbundet, ca 20h/vecka, gärna mer, arbetstiderna är flexibla. Du har inte ett fast schema utan kan anpassa arbetet efter de tider på dagen eller kvällen som passar bäst, givetvis i samråd med övriga teamet. Du har även möjlighet att fördela och planera arbetet med tanke på tentaperioder och annat skolarbete. Möjlighet till heltidsarbete under sommaren finns.
   

  

**Vi Söker Dig Som**
* Studerar data, teknik eller finansiell ekonomi (minst 1–2 år kvar)
* Har intresse för programmering, finans/försäkring och projektledning
* Är ambitiös, självgående och ansvarsfull
* Är noggrann, strukturerad och analytisk med god datavana
* Har en vilja att utvecklas långsiktigt hos Söderberg & Partners


**Vi Ser Helst Att Du Har**
* Goda kunskaper i Python (särskilt Pandas), SQL, Power Apps, Power Automate, Azure Functions/Azure och Git
* Erfarenhet av VBA och Excel
* Stark kommunikativ förmåga i både skrift och grafisk presentation
* Relevant arbetslivserfarenhet eller akademiska projekt inom programmering


 Söderberg & Partners är en kreativ och initiativrik organisation där medarbetarna drivs av ett engagemang och intresse för sina arbeten. Vi har korta kommunikationsvägar och är öppna för förändring och nya idéer. Som studentanalytiker får du snabbt ett eget ansvar för dina arbetsuppgifter.
   

  

 Rekryteringsprocessen består av 1-2 intervjuer och ett färdighetstest i Excel och Python.
   

  

 Intervjuer bokas löpande och vi rekommenderar att du skickar din ansökan så snart som möjligt. Bifoga CV, personligt brev och betyg från högskola.
   

  

**Sista ansökningsdag:** 
 2025-09-24
   

  

 Vi har riktigt bra förmåner
   

  

* Växande bolag med stora visioner
* Centrala och moderna kontor
* Utrymme för nytänkande och personlig utveckling
* Bra förmåns- och försäkringspaket
* Engagerade och kompetenta medarbetare
* Omtanke om kunden och varandra
* Growing company with big visions
* Space for innovation and personal development
* Good benefit and insurance package
* Committed and competent employees
* Care for both customer and colleagues


 Om företaget
   

  

 Söderberg & Partners grundades 2004 av nio entreprenöriella analytiker och är idag en av Sveriges ledande finansiella rådgivare och förmedlare av försäkringar och finansiella produkter.
   

  

 Vi bedriver verksamhet inom bland annat tjänstepensionsrådgivning, försäkringsrådgivning och försäkringsförmedling, samt kapitalrådgivning och kapitalförvaltning. Vi utvecklar och erbjuder även digitala verktyg för bland annat finansiell rådgivning och för löne-, och förmånshantering. Vi har valt, som första företag i svenskt näringsliv, att klimatkompensera våra medarbetare, både i arbetet och på fritiden.
   

  

 Vi har en stark företagskultur där medarbetarna har höga ambitioner och ett stort engagemang. Organisationen är kreativ och dynamisk med korta beslutsvägar och stort utrymme för egna idéer vilket skapar en inspirerande miljö där du har möjlighet att utvecklas snabbt.
   

  

 Vi premierar medarbetare som sporras av stort eget ansvar och som har drivkraft att kontinuerligt utvecklas och föra sina arbetsuppgifter framåt. Vi är måna om att hjälpa varandra, men även att ha mod att testa nya vägar.
   

  

 Mångfald och likabehandling är viktigt för oss, både när det gäller våra medarbetare och de som söker jobb hos oss. Vi uppmuntrar olikheter och är övertygade om att medarbetare med olika erfarenheter, kompetenser och referensramar hjälper oss att växa och utvecklas.
   

  

 Vår resa har bara börjat och vi söker ständigt efter begåvade och kompetenta medarbetare med en stark vilja att nå framgång. Vill du vara med och bygga vår framtid?

title: Enterprise Account Executive
description:
**Oneflow är en snabbt växande tech scale-up som ligger i hjärtat av Stockholm. Vi har skapat en plattform som automatiserar hela kontraktsprocessen från början till slut, allt på ett ställe. Förvandla klumpiga, statiska kontrakt till kundorienterade, digitala kontrakt – precis som magi!** 




  





 Nu söker vi en Enterprise Account Executive som vill spela en nyckelroll i vår fortsatta expansion. Här får du chansen att arbeta med några av Nordens största och mest välkända bolag – och samtidigt vara del av en kultur där vi alltid är #inittogether.
 



  





**Om rollen** 




  





 Som Enterprise Account Executive blir du en avgörande del i Oneflows tillväxtresa. Du kommer att driva komplexa affärer med stora organisationer, ofta med flera beslutsfattare och långa säljcykler. Rollen kräver att du kan navigera i strategiska processer, skapa starka relationer på C-level och positionera Oneflow som en affärskritisk lösning. Hos oss trivs du om du:
 



  




* vill arbeta med att etablera och växa relationer hos större organisationer i Norden och internationellt
* har en strategisk approach till försäljning och är bekväm med långa och komplexa affärsprocesser
* tycker om att påverka både affär och kultur i ett snabbväxande bolag



  





**Primära arbetsuppgifter** 




  





 I rollen förväntas du:
 



  




* arbeta strategiskt med account planning för ett urval target accounts
* driva hela säljcykeln från prospektering till avtalssignering
* skapa, utveckla och vårda relationer med beslutsfattare på C-level
* leda och koordinera interna resurser i affärerna (marketing, pre-sales, product, legal, partner m.fl.)
* bidra med best practices till säljteamet och hjälpa dina kollegor att lyckas



  





**Vad vi erbjuder** 




  





 Hos Oneflow får du:
 



  




* en plats i en snabbväxande tech scale-up med en fantastisk företagskultur (vår eNPS ligger över branschsnittet)
* att arbeta i ett team med tydliga mål och en gemensam vision
* årligt friskvårdsbidrag på 5 000 SEK
* ett välutrustat kontor med sociala ytor, snacks och dryck
* veckovisa och månatliga sociala aktiviteter
* försäkringar och pensionsplan
* inspirerande kollegor från hela världen
* en öppen, inkluderande och snabb miljö där du kan forma din egen karriärväg



  





**Om dig** 




  





 För att lyckas i rollen ser vi gärna att du har:
 



  




* dokumenterad framgång i att driva komplexa B2B-affärer inom enterprisesegmentet
* erfarenhet av att arbeta med långa säljcykler och flera beslutsfattare
* vana av att bygga förtroende på C-level och driva strategiska diskussioner
* förmåga att skapa struktur och långsiktiga planer för target accounts
* flytande svenska och engelska – fler språk är meriterande
* en ”trusted advisor”-attityd och passion för att förstå kundens affär



  





 Relevant högre utbildning är meriterande, men erfarenhet och resultat väger tyngre.
 



  





**Känns detta som dig?** 




  





 Ansök genom att skicka in ditt CV och ett personligt brev på engelska där du förklarar varför rollen är intressant för dig och varför du skulle passa bra för den. För denna tjänst krävs det kunskaper i både svenska och engelska, men vårt rekryteringsteam talar engelska.
 



  





**Vi återkommer till dig så snart som möjligt!** 




  





 Vi värdesätter jämställdhet och mångfald och strävar efter ett team som speglar dagens samhälle. Vi är en mångfaldig arbetsplats med 180 personer från 34 olika nationaliteter, och vi tror att vår olikhet, både i bakgrund och erfarenheter, är en styrka för oss.
 



  





 Besök gärna vår hemsida för mer information om vår produkt. Besök vår blogg för mer information om vår kultur och dina framtida kollegor 💜
 



  





 En sak innan du ansöker! Vi vill se den äkta dig – inte AI-dig. Tänk inte för mycket, det viktigaste är dina egna ord och vem du är. Skriv från hjärtat. 💫

title: Senior Specialist - Data Engineering
description:
**Role Description**
**DevOps Elasticsearch Expert**
**Role: DevOps Engineer – Elasticsearch Expert**
**Responsibilities**
* Ensure the stable operation of Elasticsearch clusters, maintaining high availability and performance.
* Design, maintain, and optimize monitoring of Elasticsearch clusters using Kibana.
* Delegate and oversee tasks related to the production cluster, ensuring proper execution by the Ops team.
* Develop and optimize monitoring for other system components using Prometheus and Grafana.
* Lead and manage release activities for Elasticsearch and related platforms.
* Collaborate effectively across teams to drive Agile application development.
* Provide L3-level production support to ensure system stability and timely issue resolution.


**Mandatory Skills And Experience**
* Expertise in Elasticsearch: Proven hands-on experience in managing Elasticsearch clusters, including design, optimization, and troubleshooting.
* Proficiency in Unix Shell Scripting.


**Recommended Skills**
* Solid understanding of the Hadoop Ecosystem, including tools such as Apache Spark Framework, Apache Hive, HDFS, Oozie and Parquet.
* Experience with Data Warehousing concepts, especially ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) processes and Scala language.
* Foundational knowledge of SQL, GIT, Gradle/Maven, and Java.
* Programming experience in Scala.
* Experience with CI/CD tools such as Bamboo and Jenkins.
* Proficiency in Gradle or Maven for build automation.
* Quantexa Certification (Quantexa Technical Academy Certification) or equivalent Data Engineer Certification.


**This role focuses on ensuring the stability and optimization of Elasticsearch clusters, alongside driving efficient monitoring and Agile development processes. Ideal candidates will have deep expertise in Elasticsearch and a strong commitment to system reliability and performance."**
**Skills**
**Mandatory Skills :** 
 Apache Spark,Scala,SparkSQL,Big Data Hadoop Ecosystem

title: Production Engineering – Digital Lead
description:
**Description**


**The Opportunity**

  

Are you passionate about innovation and future-ready technologies? We’re looking for a motivated Production Engineer to help drive digital transformation in our manufacturing processes. This position is part of Hitachi Energy’s HVDC (High Voltage Direct Current) business unit, based in Smedjebacken. HVDC technology enables efficient long-distance electricity transmission and interconnects power grids across countries and continents—playing a vital role in the global energy transition.


In this role, you’ll work with cutting-edge technologies such as Digitalization, Automation, Artificial Intelligence, Operator Guidance Systems (hardware and software), and the latest production tools to ensure our factories are equipped for the future.


As a key player in our Production Development Department, you’ll lead development and investment projects focused on implementing new technologies. You’ll become a natural digital leader within the organization, collaborating closely across functions and with external suppliers to bring innovative solutions to life.

**How you'll make an impact**

* Driving improvements in factory operations with a strong focus on digitalization, automation, and system development
* Developing and aligning a Digital Roadmap for the Smedjebacken Factory, in coordination with sister site
* Leading production development projects, often involving new and emerging technologies
* Supporting strategic initiatives to improve productivity and production capacity
* Continuously learning and benchmarking new digital tools, while enhancing existing solutions in areas like Operator Guidance, Automation, and system integration
* Managing the local IT/OT infrastructure, serving as the key contact for digital systems and connectivity

**Your Background**

* You’re curious, proactive, and always eager to learn and take initiative
* You’re passionate about technology, digitalization, and developing new tools and systems
* You naturally lead change, by motivating and guiding others to adopt new ways of working
* You have a solid technical background—either through industry experience or an engineering degree
* Experience with SAP, MES, IBA, connected machinery, automation, or programming is a strong plus
* Fluent in both Swedish and English, written and spoken

**What we offer**

* Collective agreement
* Flexible working time
* Health care and wellness allowance
* Fantastic career possibilities within Hitachi Energy both within Sweden and globally
* Mentor to support you throughout onboard phase
* Various trainings and education supporting employee development
* Diversified company with over 70+ nationalities working in Sweden
* Supplementary compensation for parental leave
* Employee Benefit Portal with thousands of discounts and perks

**More about us**

Are you ready for a new and exciting challenge? Does the above description sound like you? Applications will be reviewed on an ongoing basis, so don’t delay – apply today!


Recruiting manager Torbjörn Hedqvist, torbjorn.hedqvist@hitachienergy.com will answer your questions about the position. Union representatives – Sveriges Ingenjörer: Mikael Hjort +46 107-38 29 86; Unionen: Fredrik Holmgren, +46 107-38 21 85; Ledarna: Frank Hollestedt +46 107 - 38 70 43. Any other questions can be directed to Talent Partner Antra Volujevica, antra.volujevica@hitachienergy.com.

**Qualified individuals with a disability may request a reasonable accommodation if you are unable or limited in your ability to use or access the Hitachi Energy career site as a result of your disability.
